restaurant.name: Giuseppe's Italian Kitchen
restaurant.address: 456 Little Italy Street, Food District, NY 10001

appetizers.name: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Toasted bread with fresh tomatoes, basil, and garlic

appetizers.name: Calamari Fritti
appetizers.description: Crispy fried squid rings with marinara sauce

pasta.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
pasta.description: Classic Roman pasta with eggs, pecorino cheese, and pancetta

pasta.name: Penne Arrabbiata
pasta.description: Penne pasta in spicy tomato sauce with garlic and red peppers

pasta.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
pasta.description: Fresh fettuccine in creamy parmesan sauce

pizza.name: Margherita
pizza.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomato sauce, and basil

pizza.name: Pepperoni Supreme
pizza.description: Pepperoni, mozzarella, mushrooms, and bell peppers

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers

desserts.name: Gelato
